short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Donoclip Modtools adds a Donoclip icon to Twitch chat. New clip indicator & quick inbox access.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
INTRODUCING: Donoclip Modtools ðŸ”§

Mods: this addon places a little icon under Twitch chat that will LIGHT UP whenever there's a new Donoclip awaiting moderation!

Plus, clicking it will take you straight to the streamer's inbox.
